bakery.name: Bakery
bakery.description: Bakes bread from grain, providing more nutritious food than raw crops.

barracks.name: Barracks
barracks.description: Trains and houses basic infantry units.

farm.name: Farm
farm.description: Cultivates crops on fertile land, producing a steady supply of food for your settlement.

fishing_harbor.name: Fishing Harbor
fishing_harbor.description: Built along the shoreline to catch fish. Provides a reliable source of food independent of land.

house.name: House
house.description: Provides living space for new settlers. Each house increases your maximum population capacity.

hunting_lodge.name: Hunting Lodge
hunting_lodge.description: Sends hunters into the wild to gather meat and hides. Effective near forests with wildlife.

lumberjack_hut.name: Lumberjack Hut
lumberjack_hut.description: Chops down nearby trees to produce wood, the basic material for construction and fuel.

market_stall.name: Market Stall
market_stall.description: A trading post where you can exchange surplus resources with visiting merchants. Essential for balancing your economy.

mine.name: Mine
mine.description: Extracts raw ore, stone, or gold from mineral deposits. Build directly on resource nodes for maximum efficiency.

sawmill.name: Sawmill
sawmill.description: Processes raw wood into refined planks. Planks are required for advanced buildings and fortifications.

smelter.name: Smelter
smelter.description: Smelts raw ore into pure metal bars. Metal is crucial for tools, weapons, and advanced technology.

town_hall.name: Town Hall
town_hall.description: The heart of your settlement. Issues global commands, attracts new citizens, and is required for most advanced structures.

warehouse.name: Warehouse
warehouse.description: Central storage for all resources. Expands your storage capacity, allowing your economy to grow.

well.name: Well
well.description: Provides clean water to your settlement. Improves health and is needed for some advanced production chains.

pasture.name: Pasture
pasture.description: A grassy plain teeming with deer and wild game. A perfect spot for hunters to gather food and hides.

lake.name: Lake
lake.description: A life-giving source of fresh water and home to schools of fish. Ideal for building a fishing hut.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: A dense grove of ancient trees, ready to be harvested for construction and fuel.

iron_deposit.name: Iron deposit
iron_deposit.description: A rocky outcrop rich in iron ore. Mine it to forge weapons and tools.

gold_deposit.name: Gold deposit
gold_deposit.description: A rare vein of glittering gold. The key to wealth and prosperity for your settlement.
